615190.name: Fantasy Grounds - NPCs: Middle Class (Token Pack)
615190.description:
NPCs: The Middle Class

This token pack contains 43 tokens. This pack contains an assortment of non player characters of middle class standing in a typical town.
This Token Pack includes:
  • Female Alchemist
  • Female Apple Picker
  • 2 Female Barmaids
  • 2 Female Drinkers
  • Female Duchess
  • 2 Female Grape Pickers
  • 2 Female Higher Scholars
  • Female Lamp Lighter
  • 2 Female Sleeping
  • 2 Female Merchants
  • Female Messenger
  • 2 Female Seamstresses
  • Female Teacher
  • Male Artist
  • Male Bartender
  • Male Carpenter
  • Male Chef
  • Male Cleric
  • Male Fish Merchant
  • Male Gem Smith
  • Male Green Merchant
  • Male Mage Cook
  • Male Mage Dishwasher
  • 2 Male Merchants
  • Male Middle Class Sleeping
  • Male Musician Drummer
  • Male Old Lantern Bearer
  • Male Old Merchant
  • Male Potato Peeler
  • Male Purple Cleric
  • Male Shop Merchant
  • Male Sleeping Man
  • Male Weapon Merchant
  • 2 Male Wounded
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: James Holloway
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
